episodes.title: I was #FairGamed! And I LOVE IT!!! ;)
episodes.description:
I Got Fair Gamed! The Cult is scared of Me! A guy with no followers who speaks broken English and nobody watches (yet) ;) And I find that Hilarious! ;) 

I posted a video about STAND League, or in fact STAAD League, (scientologists Taking Action Against Discrimination), a scientology front group that has a blog where things are made up on the go about everyone that speaks up against their Cult. 

One of their roles is online harassment and especially on Twitter. They have a lot of accounts there but the main one is Hate Monitor, or @standmonitor. 

So I guess they didn't like that at all that some guy from middle of nowhere started pointing out there BS on videos ;) This only makes me want to do even more videos and more content ;) 

Links to videos about scientology PI's.
Mike Rinder and Aaron Smith Levin catching PI's.

episodes.title: scientology Fair Games Tampa Bay Times by harassing their advertisers
episodes.description:
STAND League, or in fact STAAD League, (scientologists Taking Action Against Discrimination) is a scientology front group that has a blog where things are made up on the go about everyone that speaks up against their Cult. 

One of their roles is online harassment and especially on Twitter. They have a lot of accounts there but the main one is Hate Monitor, or @standmonitor. In this video I’ll take a look at their harassment against journalists in general, Tracey McManus, journalist at Tampa Bay Times and the paper itself.

They recently started to harass advertisers at Tampa Bay Times and I’ll show you all about that. 

Links to video mentioned.

Watch this first!
The Story of Serge Obolensky - An Aftermath Foundation Survivor Story
